question: Olivia receives 125 emails a day. 14% of those emails don't require any response. He responds to the rest of them. How many emails does Olivia respond to in a 6 day work week?
answer:
Olivia receives 125*14/100=<<125*14/100=17>>17 emails that don't require a response
So he responds to 125-17=<<125-17=107>>107 emails per day
In a 6 day work week, Olivia responds to 107*6=<<107.5*6=642>> 642 emails
#### 642
